org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure

Class GridContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.GridContainer

  • public class GridContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class keeps track of GridSites and the replicate and copy methods are used to transfer files from one site to another.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static GridContainer getInstance()
        Singleton; get the single instance of this object
        Returns:
        The GridContainer instance.

      • networkSegment

        public Bandwidth networkSegment(GridSite siteA,
                       GridSite siteB)
        Return the Bandwidth object for the segment between siteA and siteB
        Parameters:
        siteA - First site in connection
        siteB - Second site in connection
        Returns:
        the Bandwidth object connecting both sites, or null if there isn't one

      • networkSegment

        public Bandwidth networkSegment(GridSitePair gsp)
        Return the Bandwidth object for the GridSitePair gsp
        Parameters:
        gsp - The GridSitePair object describing the two GridSites
        Returns:
        the Bandwidth object describing the network link between the two sites, or null if they have no direct connection

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection(GridSite siteA,
                 GridSite siteB)
        Go through the best route from siteA to siteB, incrementing the number of network connections at each site

      • dropConnection

        public void dropConnection(GridSite siteA,
                  GridSite siteB)
        Go through the best route from siteA to siteB, decreasing the number of network connections at each site

      • availableBandwidth

        public float availableBandwidth(GridSite siteA,
                       GridSite siteB)
        Go through each site in optimal route from siteA to siteB, keeping track of the minimum bandwith available. This is returned as the available bandwidth between the two sites for potential file transfers.

      • currentBandwidth

        public float currentBandwidth(GridSite siteA,
                     GridSite siteB)
        Go through each site in optimal route from siteA to siteB, keeping track of the minimum bandwith currently in use. This is returned as the current bandwidth between the two sites for ongoing file transfers.

      • printState

        public void printState()
        A method for dumping the current state of the Grid to the terminal

      • maxBandwidth

        public float maxBandwidth(GridSite siteA,
                 GridSite siteB)
        Go through each site in optimal route from siteA to siteB, keeping track of the minimum pair-wise maximum-bandwith. This is returned as the maximum available (or potential) bandwidth between the two sites

      • addNetworkRoutes

        public void addNetworkRoutes(GridSite site,
                    java.util.Map pred,
                    java.util.Map neighbouringBW)
        Method to register a best-network-route Map for a given source Site
        Parameters:
        site - Site that we're concerned with here
        pred - The Predecessor Map
        neighbouringBW - maps between neighbouring sites and the link bandwidth

      • freeCEs

        public java.util.ListIterator freeCEs()
        Returns a List of CEs for which the queue size is less than the maximum allowed.
        Returns:
        the List of free CEs

      • siteNeighbours

        public java.util.Set siteNeighbours(GridSite site)
        Find all the GridSites that are directly connected to the named site
        Parameters:
        site - The site under consideration
        Returns:
        A set of neighbouring sites. TODO: this should only be used in GridSite, and a call made from there TODO: for performance, this could be stored as a Map between site and a Set of GridSites

      • allGridSites

        public java.util.Enumeration allGridSites()
        Returns an enumeration over all the GridSites in the GridContainter.
        Returns:
        Enumeration over the GridSites.

      • shutDownAllCEs

        public void shutDownAllCEs()
        This will tell all CEs to finish. The method will block until all the threads are finished

      • addSite

        public void addSite(GridSite gs)
        Add a site to the overall Grid "Container"
        Parameters:
        gs - The GridSite we wish to add

      • startAllP2P

        public void startAllP2P()
        Starts all the P2Ps at the GridSites.

      • shutDownAllP2P

        public void shutDownAllP2P()
        Shuts down all the P2Ps at the GridSites. The StorageBrokers are shut down first, then the P2P system.

      • startAllCEs

        public void startAllCEs()
        Tell GridContainer to inform all Sites to start their CEs

      • iterateGridSites

        public java.util.Iterator iterateGridSites()
        Allow calling routine to iterate over all GridSites
        Returns:
        An iterator over all GridSites

      • findGridSiteByID

        public GridSite findGridSiteByID(int id)
        Find the GridSite with a specified reference ID
        Parameters:
        id - The GridSite reference to look for.
        Returns:
        The GridSite if found, null otherwise

      • pauseAllCEs

        public void pauseAllCEs()
        Pause all CEs in existence.

      • unpauseAllCEs

        public void unpauseAllCEs()
        Unpause all CEs in existence.

      • replicate

        public DataFile replicate(DataFile fromFile,
                 StorageElement toSE)
        Method to transfer the file from one site to another and create a copy of the file in the destination SE. It gets a FileTransfer object from the FileTransferFactory and uses it to move the file.
        Returns:
        The replica if successful, null otherwise

      • getStatistics

        public Statistics getStatistics()
        Request a statistics tree for the current state of the simulation.
        Returns:
        The head statistic (for GridContainer).

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overload the toString method to contain GridContainer specific label
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • copy

        public void copy(DataFile fromFile,
        GridSite toSite,
        float fileFraction)
        Used to transfer file if no replication is taking place, using the same file transfer mechanism as replicate() but does not add the file to the destination SE.

      • countCEs

        public int countCEs()
        Returns the total number of known CEs.
        Returns:
        an integer representing total number of CEs

        public int numberOfSites()
        Returns the total number of site on the Grid.

        Parameters:

      • randomJob

        public GridJob randomJob()
        Find a random job to run, based on probability of each job
        Returns:
        a job if one could be found, null otherwise.
